files.patch:
@@ -45,0 +45,3 @@
+  // GC thread root traversal likely used OopMapCache a lot, which
+  // might have created lots of old entries. Trigger the cleanup now.
+  OopMapCache::trigger_cleanup();
@@ -55,3 +58,0 @@
-  // GC thread root traversal likely used OopMapCache a lot, which
-  // might have created lots of old entries. Trigger the cleanup now.
-  OopMapCache::trigger_cleanup();
